question: Which of the following delivered a speech on 4th April, 1919 on Hindu-Muslim Unity from the pulpit of Jama Masjid in Delhi?
explanation: Swami Shradhanand on April 4, 1919 delivered a speech on Hindu-Muslim unity from the pulpit of Jama Masjid in Delhi. He was also known as Mahatma Munshi Ram Viji. He was an Indian Independence activist and an Arya Samaj sannyasi.
